headline: Visiting Media Appoints Eric Sniff as Chief Technology Officer
summary: Eric Sniff, CTO of Visiting Media Visiting Media, the leader in immersive sales and marketing technology for the hospitality industry, today announced the appointment of Eric Sniff as Chief Technology Officer (CTO). NEW YORK, Sept. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Visiting Media, the leader in immersive sales and marketing technology for the hospitality industry, today announced the appointment of Eric Sniff as Chief Technology Officer (CTO).
